ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Does this ever happen to anyone else
ygData.msgSnippet: These sorts of things happen online. You can try and pursue the matter further to try and get this person in trouble, but it s rather hard to get a complaint
ygData.messageBody:
These sorts of things happen online. You can try and pursue the matter
further to try and get this person in trouble, but it's rather hard to get
a complaint to result in actual punishment. Unless you are seriously
offended and upset by comments like this online, it's probably best just
to ignore the teenager in question. Remember, you can ignore anyone with
the following command:

/ignore name

When someone is on ignore, you can't hear anything they say.

- Christina


On Sun, 10 Nov 2002, Brangvyne wrote:

> Salutations All!
>
> Another question.
>
> I was on last night and ran into this dwarf who keep asking my half
> elf ranger to see her Boobies/mellons (his exact terms) for which he
> offered to pay me some gold. I said no thanks and ran off and he
> didn't follow me.
>
> Has something like this happened to anyone else?
> What is the correct response, what should I do, or did I handle it
> right?
> It bothered me but when I told the person I was grouping with they
> just laughed it off, so I said no big deal and went on, but I'm not
> sure. Anyway, any advice?
>
> :o)
> Brangvyne
> lvl 10 wood elf ranger
> Xegony (sp)
> lvl 1 half elf bard
> Cazic Thule (sp)
>
>
>
